content.en: Blockchain for EVs: Researchers are exploring how blockchain technology can improve various aspects of electric vehicle (EV) charging and energy trading. They are using algorithms, such as the Iceberg order execution algorithm and the Iterative convex-concave procedure algorithm, to minimize power fluctuation, incentivize EV participation in demand response, optimize charging behaviors, and provide fair charging services. These blockchain-enabled systems aim to ensure secure and coordinated trading, achieve robust and efficient power management, and enable multi-level power transactions for EV charging stations.
content.da: Blockchain for EVs: Forskere undersøger, hvordan blockchain-teknologi kan forbedre forskellige aspekter af opladning af elbiler (EV) og energihandel. De bruger algoritmer som Iceberg order execution algorithm og Iterative convex-concave procedure algorithm for at minimere strømsvingninger, motivere EV-deltagelse i efterspørgselsrespons, optimere opladningsadfærd og levere fair opladningstjenester. Disse blockchain-aktiverede systemer har til formål at sikre sikker og koordineret handel, opnå robust og effektiv strømstyring og muliggøre flerniveaustransaktioner for opladningsstationer til elbiler.
